item.title: Japan once again: update from the Banana House in Osaka
item.description: I've been in Japan for the past few weeks, and have been lazy about updating my blog, which I promised to do! I've been busy sorting through pictures! Here's a video update from where I'll be staying long term at a place called the Banana House:
